tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Financial_Indicators (
  Company_ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Net_Profit DECIMAL,
  Revenue DECIMAL,
  Operating_Expenses DECIMAL,
  EBITDA DECIMAL,
  Net_Assets DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Financial_Statements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    statement_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    revenue DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    expenses DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    net_income DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Ratios (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ratio_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    numerator DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    denominator DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    ratio_value DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Performance_Indicators (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    actual_value DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    target_value DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_ratios (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  revenue DECIMAL,
  net_income DECIMAL,
  profit_margin DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE performance_indicators (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  expenses DECIMAL,
  assets DECIMAL,
  liabilities DECIMAL,
  return_on_assets DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE efficiency_ratios (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  inventory_turnover DECIMAL,
  receivables_turnover DECIMAL,
  asset_turnover DECIMAL
);
